actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the deduction for moving expenses.

summary.text: Allows a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for moving expenses incurred by members of the uniformed services. Defines allowable moving expenses and makes special provisions for members of uniformed services assigned to a tour of duty outside the United States or in Alaska.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the deduction for moving expenses.
